Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Platter.Platt: Removes all parcels from the map, permanently. Buildings that are not on a vanilla zone grid will despawn, unless you have a mod that prevents that.
Options.WARNING[Platter.Platter.PlatterM: WARNING: Permanently remove all parcels from this save?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Platter.Platt: Shortcut to toggle the rendering of parcel overlays on or off.
Shortcut to increase/decrease a Parcel's depth
Shortcut to increase/decrease a Parcel's depth
Shortcut to increase/decrease a Parcel's setback from the road.
Shortcut to toggle allowing the spawning of buildings on parcels.
Shortcut to open the Platter panel.
Opens a browser window to https://github.com/lucarager/CS2-Platter
Opens link to join the CS:2 Modding Discord
PlatterMod.UI.Tooltip.RoadPlatMode: Road Platting Mode is under active development. Stay tuned!
PlatterMod.UI.Tooltip.SnapModeZoneSide: Snap to sides of a road
PlatterMod.UI.Tooltip.SnapModeRoadSide: Snap to sides of the vanilla zone grid
PlatterMod.UI.Tooltip.ToggleAllowSpawn: Toggle allowing buildings to spawn on Parcels
PlatterMod.UI.Tooltip.ShowZonbes: Toggle allowing buildings to spawn on Parcels
PlatterMod.UI.Tooltip.BuildingCount: {COUNT} available {X}x{Y} buildings in the selected zone.
PlatterMod.UI.Tooltip.BuildingCountWarni: No {X}x{Y} buildings in selected zone. Smaller buildings may spawn on this parcel.
PlatterMod.UI.Modals.FirstLaunch.Title: Thanks for installing Platter!
PlatterMod.UI.Modals.FirstLaunch.Subtitl: Here's a quick intro to get you started
PlatterMod.UI.Modals.FirstLaunch.Tutoria:
Access parcels via the __Platter tab__ in the zone toolbar __(CTRL+P)__.
Select a parcel to start plopping.

No need to manually block the vanilla grid â€” you can place parcels directly on top.

Select __Pre-Zone__ to automatically zone parcels and get information about your zone/size combination.
Parcels also fully support the vanilla zoning tools.
Use the __top-left menu__ to toggle the parcel overlay or temporarily halt buildings spawning on empty parcels.
PlatterMod.UI.Modals.FirstLaunch.Disclai:
Platter is an experimental beta mod.

To uninstall: You must use the button in the Settings page to safely remove custom parcels from your save before removing the mod.
